synopsis.text:
Knights of the Sky and Melodious Idols: A New Chapter in Macross Delta

Eight years have passed since the epic events of Macross Frontier, and the year is now 2067. A mysterious and dangerous phenomenon, known as the Var Syndrome, is spreading its dark tendrils across the galaxy, consuming everything in its path. To combat this universal threat, a new generation of skilled Valkyrie pilots has emerged. Enter the Delta Squadron, a battle-hardened team of pilots, and Walküre, a talented group of idols who also double as Valkyrie pilots.

As if the Var Syndrome wasn't enough of a challenge, our heroes must also face the enigmatic Aerial Knights. Hailing from the Kingdom of Wind, this Valkyrie fighter team is shrouded in mystery and has come forth to challenge the Delta Squadron.

Join the Delta Squadron and Walküre in their thrilling and perilous journey as they battle against the Var Syndrome and the Aerial Knights. The fate of the galaxy rests in their capable hands, and the time for valor and song is now!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
